title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The enchanted spear is a striking weapon, crafted from a shimmering silver metal that glistens with an ethereal glow. Its sleek, elongated shaft is adorned with intricate designs and sharp, pointed embellishments, hinting at its deadly precision. At the top, a menacing spearhead culminates in a triangular shape, featuring swirling motifs that suggest ancient magic imbued within the weapon. This spear is not only a tool for combat but also a symbol of power, often favored by legendary warriors in their quests. Its balance and design render it both beautiful and deadly, making it a prized possession for any adventurer.
